Neither Here Nor There

June 28th

June 28, 2001

Categories

  • from archive

I leave tommorow for Arizona. I’m excited. My first real trip to try out my new camera. And I’m going to the Grand Canyon, how do you photograph that? I’ve been thinking, planning, and scheming in my mind. Who knows.

This is pretty cool, www.roadtospringfield.com where you can vote for your favorite secondary character from the Simpsons, bracket-style Ã la march madness. Things are currently entering the second round. Current match-up is Mayor Quimby v. Lionel Hutz. As I always say, Vote Quimby.

Tigers?!? Again?!?!? Against the Royals?!?!
